pullRequest.title: Support writing TIMESTAMPTZ with JSON encoder

nodes.bodyText:
preexisting, but there is no point to cover all aspects of the tested class within single test method.
these testTime, testTimestamp, etc above should be their own test methods.
then your new test cases would go to an isolated testTimestampWithTimeZone method

that's very repetitive, but maybe that's fine... let's format this on lines:
        testTimestampWithTZ(
                sqlTimestampWithTimeZoneOf(3, 2020, 8, 18, 12, 38, 29, 123000000, UTC_KEY),
                ZonedDateTime.of(2020, 8, 18, 12, 38, 29, 123000000, UTC).toEpochSecond());

and remove getEpochSecondsFromDateTimeWithZone method

can you please extract test splitting as a prep commit?
(i am aware you would need to squash&rebase the existing work piece for that)

commit.message:
Support writing TIMESTAMPTZ with JSON encoder

Fixes #5955.
